replies.body: I know that is frustrating but I can't stop laughing.

I mean I make my runes before game and switch them if I need to, so I had the right runes but damn is that infuriating.
Lol I also do them depending on the game thank god this shit doesn't happen to me or is be running aftershock ekko

> [{quoted}](name=RyzeRework,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=u7kxk4Nz,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2020-01-29T15:32:27.045+0000)
>
> Lol I also do them depending on the game thank god this shit doesn't happen to me or is be running aftershock ekko

I mean as long as you hit that stun your good... With that said I usually miss my stun cuz silver mid ego yk.
Predicting his w is actually kinda hard because either they walk into it and you look like a god or they go the other way and you get spam pinged for missing

> [{quoted}](name=RyzeRework,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=u7kxk4Nz,comment-id=00000000000100000000,timestamp=2020-01-29T22:39:00.168+0000)
>
> Predicting his w is actually kinda hard because either they walk into it and you look like a god or they go the other way and you get spam pinged for missing

That only matters for mid ekko tho, for jg ekko, you put it behind them and it slows them and zones up half a lane and basically guaruntees a free kill. There's a reason he's been the best jungler in the game for months
Then youre fill and you dont have them ready for you position.
Yeah that's my fear. I have 10 rune pages for god knows why, so I have most of the types but yeah it's still an annoying bug

Remember, Tencent Holding is only a multi-Billion small indie company and the League client is still in the beta phase.

We all remember when the new Chromium-based client being first announced, apparently being oh-so much better than the old, Adobe Air-based one, being coded from the ground-up and everything.

Then the client became a reality and stayed in its alpha stage for a while before it left alpha and entered its beta stage. This is of course all old news.
However...the client never officially left the beta stage. So it's important not to demand too much of it even after how many years since its release.

> [{quoted}](name=PaladinNO,realm=EUNE,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=u7kxk4Nz,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2020-01-29T05:02:06.857+0000)
>
> Remember, Tencent Holding is only a multi-Billion small indie company, and the League client is still beta.
> 
> We all remember the Chromium-based client being first announced, apparently being oh-so much better than the old, Adobe Air-based one, being coded from the ground-up and everything.
> 
> Then the client became a reality and entered its alpha stage for a while before it left alpha and entered its beta stage. This is all old news.
> However...the client never officially left the beta stage. So it's important not to demand too much of it after how many years since its release.

The Riot Games client is like the TF2 of gaming.. TF2 was in beta 10 years as well...

> [{quoted}](name=Padoµch,realm=EUNE,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=u7kxk4Nz,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2020-01-29T06:53:11.826+0000)
>
> The ~~Riot~~ Tencent Games client is like the TF2 of gaming.. TF2 was in beta 10 years as well...

Kinda like Duke Nukem: Forever. AKA "DNF" or "Did Not Finish". But just you wait, once Half-Life 2: Episode 3 is released, we'll get a working client.

Inb4 "Use the Hextech Tool Repair", which doesn't even do anything at all

Jokes asides, at least you can play, I had to restart my computer like 3 or 4 times before I could log in and/or play a game, because either the client says "You have no internet access or you use a VPN" while I was connected speaking with friends on Discord and no VPN, or I could log in, but it says that I couldn't log into the client because of login issues or even not play or create a party because "lol fuck you", it just goes into Coop vs AI by default like if it was a new account, with a warning sign on every single mode.

This season starts so well lmao

it's not a bug. it's a feature. So you don't lose sight of that pretty champion profile in the background with a stupid overlaying window with stupid runes.

be more appreciative !
lol it's still not fixed? i've had that bug more than a month ago xD
Yep, happened to me too lol. Couldn't enter chat as well, or change summoner spells or anything

> [{quoted}](name=Levy McGarden,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=u7kxk4Nz,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2020-01-29T04:01:22.606+0000)
>
> Yep, happened to me too lol. Couldn't enter chat as well, or change summoner spells or anything

That's because you didn't close the buggy rune window. The window wasn't visible, but it was there, blocking the stuff "below" it. Note how OP closes the window in the GIF.
This happened to me the other day as well. Had fun playing a AP mage with all Tank runes -_-
[oh you think thats bad? I couldn't even pick my champ.](https://twitter.com/EpicSpaceTurtle/status/1218775527361634307/photo/1)
Hey can you share the program you used to record a gif?

> [{quoted}](name=Voidner,realm=EUNE,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=u7kxk4Nz,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2020-01-29T19:50:36.966+0000)
>
> Hey can you share the program you used to record a gif?

Yeah I use ShareX (gif record is default to ctrl + shift + print screen. You can have it set up to send to a private server like I do, imgur, or save locally (and some others). However I cant ever get it to work in game either fullscreen or borderless
Honestly infuriating that things are still this way.
Same problem here.

Another bug that had been on PBE for quite some time, was fixed, re-appeared and ended up on Live servers even tho it had been reported many times.
They really do not care about PBE, do they?
